What?





Plotting different data/variable types

Categorical v. Numeric






Categorical variables are for separate, distinct countable items.

Numerical variables can be either integers (discrete) or decimals (continuous).

Types of Categorical variables






Nominal: arbitrary categories

Ordinal: ordered categories

Dichotomous: yes/no



Bivariate categorical



Bivariate numerical (continuous)


LINK: Making Hans Rosling's Gapminder plots with Python in Plot.ly
